title: ‘Rivers of Blood’ Flow in Bangladesh After Muslim Festival of Sacrifice
subtitle: Viral images show streets running red with bloody water in parts of Dhaka, Bangladesh, after heavy rains coincided with ritual animal sacrifices on the Muslim holy day of Eid al-Adha.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The streets in some parts of Dhaka, Bangladesh were awash in bloody water after mass animal sacrifices took place on the Islamic holiday Eid al-Adha.
